Ãƒâ€ºÃƒÅ¸                                                                              


   Breaking a new record in the history of Korean movies, Taegukgi: The 
   Brotherhood of War devoured a production cost of $12.8 million. However, 
   the expenses seem to have paid off well as it continued to become a week-
   long nationwide success selling no less than two million tickets in merely 
   five days. 
   
   Jin-tae is a happy shoeshine boy, planning to marry Young-shin soon. 
   However, with the outbreak of the Korean War (25 June 1950). Jin-tae and 
   his younger brother Jin-tae volunteers in every suicidal mission in order 
   to earn the Medal of Honour, the only way that will secure the discharge of 
   his younger brother. Jin-seok misunderstands Jin-tea's good intentions as 
   an obsession with fame and glory.
